verses.name: Jeremiah 31:27
verses.text: Behold, the days come, saith the Lord, that I will sow the house of Israel and the house of Judah with the seed of man, and with the seed of beast.

verses.name: Jeremiah 31:28
verses.text: And it shall come to pass, that like as I have watched over them, to pluck up, and to break down, and to throw down, and to destroy, and to afflict; so will I watch over them, to build, and to plant, saith the Lord.

verses.name: Jeremiah 31:29
verses.text: In those days they shall say no more, The fathers have eaten a sour grape, and the children’s teeth are set on edge.
